original_text: And his servants said to him, “Behold now, we have heard that the kings of the house of Israel are merciful kings. Let us put sackcloth around our waists and ropes on our heads and go out to the king of Israel. Perhaps he will spare your life.”
korean_text: 그의 신하들이 그에게 말하되 우리가 들은즉 이스라엘 집의 왕들은 인자한 왕이라 하니 만일 우리가 굵은 베로 허리를 동이고 테두리를 머리에 쓰고 이스라엘의 왕에게로 나아가면 그가 혹시 왕의 생명을 살리리이다 하고

sentences.original_text: And his servants said to him,
that the kings of the house of Israel
Let us put sackcloth around our waists
and go out to the king of Israel.
Perhaps he will spare your life.”
sentences.korean_translation: 어쩌면 그가 당신의 목숨을 살려줄 것입니다.”
